definition: collecting together (of distinguished people or exquisite objects)/to gather/to assemble

sentences.english: Yueqing has a long history, human and cultural resources.
sentences.chinese: 乐清历史悠久，人文荟萃。

sentences.english: Patient actuarial survival was determined by Kaplan-Meier analysis.
sentences.chinese: 采用荟萃分析精确计算了患者的生存率。

sentences.english: Harvard is a world-famous institution of higher learning, attracting the best minds and bringing them up generation after generation.
sentences.chinese: 哈佛是世界著名的高等学府，精英荟萃，人才辈出。

sentences.english: Measures of associations were pooled quantitatively using meta-analytic methods.
sentences.chinese: 利用荟萃分析的方法合并相关性指标。

sentences.english: London was "the biggest aggregation of human life-the most complete compendium of the world".
sentences.chinese: 伦敦是“人文荟萃之区，全球最完备的缩影”。

sentences.english: Wuzhong District has a long history and historic celebrities.
sentences.chinese: 吴中区历史悠久，人文荟萃。

sentences.english: London was the biggest aggregation of human life.
Wa culture of the Chinese cultures meet.
sentences.chinese: 临沧是中国佤族文化的荟萃之地。

sentences.english: Guangzhou Xianlie Road is a collection of modern memorial cemetery.
sentences.chinese: 广州先烈路是一条近代纪念性陵园荟萃之路。

sentences.english: Here is an inspiring place producing outstanding and talented people.
sentences.chinese: 这里，人杰地灵，群贤荟萃。

sentences.english: The city showcases the East and the West and produces outstanding people.
sentences.chinese: 这个城市荟萃中西文化，人杰地灵。

sentences.english: There is also a selection of delectable non-alcoholic cocktails .
sentences.chinese: 而口感宜人的无酒精鸡尾酒也荟萃于此。

sentences.english: Shenzhen is characteristic of localization, nature and culture.
sentences.chinese: 深圳富本土风情，自然风光与人文荟萃一处。

sentences.english: Kunming is the natural landscape and humanistic landscape.
sentences.chinese: 昆明还是自然景观和人文景观的荟萃之地。

sentences.english: A quarterly trade title features full color, large-format illustrations of brand name watches gleaned from around the world.
sentences.chinese: 名表时尚季刊，荟萃环球知名流行品牌，为市场导览。

definition: to gather (in a crowd)/to converge/to swarm
brilliant and varied/(often in the combination 精彩纷呈)
to collect/to compile/to converge/also written 彙集|汇集[hui4 ji2]
domestic and international/at home and abroad
to make a name/to become famous
